attributes.action: Tell us where the pediophiles are.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let us know, via a goverment run web site (as they do in America ), when pediophiles are in our areas, so we can protect our children.This is only fair to our childrens well being & our peace of mind.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
